channel.title: Bandos Battle Axe [Not finished]
channel.description:
People told me to make webs or omething different from skillcapes so i tried making a bandos battle axe and here it is:
[img]http://images.princejefferson.com/715cea403ae7f63c2a4130e0ae88c5ff.png[/img]
If you want the model do comment

item.title: Bandos Battle Axe [Not finished]
item.dc:creator: @CoonHunter CoonHunter
item.description:
@CoonHunter wrote:

[quote=“xldarkwinglx, post:15, topic:353395”][quote author=reyx7 link=topic=449719.msg3299298#msg3299298 date=1281187592]
What coon said. also, it’s nothing but a trace. Use primitives. They give you nice looking, 3d models.
[/quote]

“Bandos Battle axe [Not Finished]”
Who said he wasn’t gunna add the 3d textures?[/quote]
Look at the date moron, this won’t be finished as he was never planning on finishing it. There was never any updates on it.

Read full topic

item.title: Bandos Battle Axe [Not finished]
item.dc:creator: @Cowarooroo Cowarooroo
item.description:
@Cowarooroo wrote:

[quote=“dylan_0789, post:10, topic:353395”][quote author=h1 sk1ller link=topic=449719.msg3300211#msg3300211 date=1281242583]
Wow dude actually fucking take some time on your models, or just don’t model at all, also post your models when they aren’t just extruded…
[/quote]
They arent even extruded. He C+P’ed and created faces around edges. He was in such a rush that he missed the top prong. Look closely at the right side of the center prong.[/quote]
Oh wow lol, it’s like he took extra steps to make it not good…

Read full topic

item.title: Bandos Battle Axe [Not finished]
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

h1 sk1ller:

Wow dude actually fucking take some time on your models, or just don’t model at all, also post your models when they aren’t just extruded…

They arent even extruded. He C+P’ed and created faces around edges. He was in such a rush that he missed the top prong. Look closely at the right side of the center prong.

item.title: Bandos Battle Axe [Not finished]
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

OK can you please stop spamming the thread with multiple 10 minute models and just post one 2 hour model? I know you’re new and all but usually after the first or second horrid trace people move onto primitive modeling. I guess this is the first time mopar hasn’t brutally flamed someone for doing what they all did like 8 months back… Check out the guides on this forum as I know for a fact there are a few great ones; and next time… Please only post a model which you feel will impress Moparscape or you feel could be great but are unaware of what to change.

Read full topic
